text: thought Nika this is the short and sweet
version of youngnam Kotov which is a
salad of crispy fried rice balls and
sausage for the full version of this
recipe please click the link in the
description below first let's make the
rice balls in a mixing bowl combine red
curry paste fish sauce sugar kaffir lime
leaves grated coconut meat and 1 egg
stir it up then add some rice and mix it
up really well form the rice into balls
or you can do pucks make a simple batter
of rice flour and water dip the rice
balls and fry them at 350 when they're
beautifully browned and crispy they are
done for the salad break apart the NAMM
or our SAR fermented sausage and set
aside smash up the rice balls and then
add the sausage green onions cilantro
ginger shallots sought to us coriander
chili flakes peanuts and a big squeeze
of lime some extra fish sauce toss it
all together and give it a taste and now
to serve wrap the salad in a crisp
lettuce leaf and munch away
